title: How can people treat sensational headline writers correctly? - Quora

response.answer_text: Sensationalist headlines are shouting for clicks. The more people click on them, the more incentive they have to keep doing it. These stories are usually underwhelming, as they oversell what they have to say. The best way to treat them is simple: don’t read them. If you read them, you gave them one more unit of what they want, clicks. If you share them, even if you do it to denounce their absurd, you’ll give them some of your friends’ clicks. So, don’t click. Don’t share. Don’t play the game. They will only waste your time. And you’ll be giving them exactly what they want.
